name: Pix-Black
description:
This is a dungeon crawler game I made for Scratch Game Jam #3. You (a black cube) traverse an unknown dungeon to find the exit. Avoid enemies and obstacles and find your way out!

Relevance to the theme (opposites attract):

When making the game mechanic to match the theme, I drove most of my inspiration from Limbo.  An eerie game that uses light and dark elements to make it stand out. So, that is what I tried to replicate (in my own style). The map is mostly unviewable except for the exit at the end of each level. With trial and error, you'll have to find the right path out.

Music: Pixabay
